description: The restaurant trade is in the family genes: already an inn in the 19C, the Prato Gaio takes inspiration from the cuisine of the Oltrepò region. A selection of traditional specialities alongside dishes reinterpreted with flair and imagination are served. An essential stop for anyone looking for local flavour.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
